sentences.en: A null - balance system is provided by balancing the magnetic forces by electrostatic forces.
sentences.cn: 零位平衡系统是靠静电力来平衡磁力而造成的.

sentences.en: A two parameters method based on electrostatic sensor is designed.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了基于静电传感器的双参数法测量质量流量的新方法.

sentences.en: And it can significantly increase luster , decontaminate and anti - electrostatic.
sentences.cn: 并带有一定的芬芳气味.

sentences.en: Another BI system, recently deployed with promising results, features an electrostatic pad that presses against the offender’s upper arm at all times, chemically “tasting” sweat for signs of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 最近另外一种BI公司发明的系统也获得了良好的成效。 这种静电发射的装置通过按压违法者的上臂来 “品尝”他体内的酒精含量。

sentences.en: Case made of quality cold - rolling steel with surface of electrostatic spray plastics.
sentences.cn: 外壳采用冷扎板拉深,表面静电喷塑工艺.

sentences.en: Electrostatic and magnetic vector potential. Properties of dielectrics and magnetic materials.
sentences.cn: 静电学和向量磁位、二极体和磁性材料的性质.

sentences.en: Electrostatic attraction will play a major role in the absorption of viruses to positively charged surfaces.
sentences.cn: 静电吸引在病毒吸附到带正电荷的表面中起主要的作用.

sentences.en: For particulates, the favored devices are inertial impactors, cyclones, electrostatic precipitators, and filters.
sentences.cn: 分离颗粒常用的装置是惯性冲击器, 旋风分离器, 静电除尘器和过滤器.

sentences.en: Guitar's experiments did not stimulate any practical study of the electrostatic - precipitation principle.
sentences.cn: 吉他的试验均未能激起任何关于电收尘原理的实用性研究.

sentences.en: Let us consider the implication of the electrostatic theorem for chemical bonding in diatomic molecules.
sentences.cn: 让我们讨论双原子分子化学成键所蕴含的静电定理.

sentences.en: Techniques for controlling particulates include filtering, washing, centrifugal separation, and electrostatic precipitation.
sentences.cn: 控制颗粒污染物的技术包括过滤 、 洗涤 、 离心分离 、 静电沉降.

sentences.en: The dedusting efficiency of the electrostatic dust precipitator was enhanced after reform.
sentences.cn: 改造后,电除尘器除尘效率提高.

sentences.en: The electrostatic summation must be evaluated for an explicIt'set of ion position.
sentences.cn: 静电能的加和必须根据离子的具体位置来计算.

sentences.en: The propellants are acceptable for military purposes as relates to surveillance, electrostatic sensitivity and friction sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 就监视安定度,静电感度和摩擦感度而言, 这些推进剂是可作为军用的.

sentences.en: This is the most convenient reference level for most electrostatic problems.
sentences.cn: 对大多数的静电问题来说,这是最方便的参考点.

sentences.en: This paper first presents the working principle of passive detection electrostatic fuze.
sentences.cn: 首先介绍了被动式静电引信的工作原理.

sentences.en: When a head dissociates, one charge remains stuck at the interface, and the other, attracted to the surface by electrostatic forces, wanders only a short distance away.
sentences.cn: 当一个头电离之后，一个电荷保留在表面上，而另一个电荷则由于静电力的吸引而在很短的一段距离外游动。
